caption:
Table 5: Comparisons with state-of-the-art methods on the COCO val set. 
Input size and the GFLOPs are calculated under top-down single person pose 
estimation setting. Unless specified, the number of decoder layers is set to 6. "3 
Dec.": three decoder layers.
